div.h2: The Leader in Sales Funnel Optimization

div.p: Aberdeen is the leading global provider of behavioral-based solutions that drive your sales funnel. Our solutions accelerate your revenue growth by Identifying, Prioritizing, and Engaging prospects at the optimal points throughout the buying journey.

q.p: “Aberdeen Intent is having a positive impact through campaigns. We’re seeing better conversions and delivering a timelier and more relevant message once we can see the signals through the intent data.”

div.span: BRAD GILLESPIE • VP OF ENTERPRISE & CORPORATE MARKETING, CVENT

q.p: “[Aberdeen data] is A, massively rich and detailed, very accurate, and B, goes back a long time so you can see these trends evolving. So you have great data over many decades…. this is the best American data on IT. If you want to get a picture going back it really is the Aberdeen data.”

div.span: NICK BLOOM • PROFESSOR OF ECONOMICS, STANFORD UNIVERSITY

q.p: “Our sellers started to adopt Aberdeen Intent rather quickly and have had some really interesting early wins.”

div.span: TOM WERLE • CHIEF STRATEGY OFFICER, MILLER HEIMAN GROUP

div.a: 2020: The Golden Age of Video Conferencing Software

h4.a: 2020: The Golden Age of Video Conferencing Software

div.div: Analyst Insight, Analytics and Business Intelligence, Featured Articles, Intent, Marketing and Sales

a.aria-label: 2020: The Golden Age of Video Conferencing Software

h2.a: 2020: The Golden Age of Video Conferencing Software

div.p: COVID-19 has undoubtedly changed the way we work, bringing about a massive rise in the use of video conferencing software. But which of these leading softwares are garnering the most user traffic? Aberdeen Behavioral Technographic data can tell us.

article.class: fusion-post-grid post-45903 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-featured category-intent category-marketing category-cmo-essentials tag-buyers-journey tag-content tag-leads tag-link-sharing tag-marketing-qualified-lead tag-mql

div.div: Featured Articles, Intent, Marketing, Marketing and Sales

div.p: To keep up with modern buyers, we must move beyond the MQL and look at other ways to determine how an account’s behavior can be the equivalent (or better) of what an MQL represents.

article.class: fusion-post-grid post-45890 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-big-datapro-essentials category-featured category-intent category-marketing category-cmo-essentials category-marketspace tag-aberdeen-intent-data tag-b2b-buyer-intent-data tag-buyer-intent tag-buyer-journey tag-buyer-research tag-intent-data tag-intent-qualified-opportunities

div.a: Marketing with Intent to Solve Problems, Not Just Sell a Product

h4.a: Marketing with Intent to Solve Problems, Not Just Sell a Product

div.div: Analytics and Business Intelligence, Featured Articles, Intent, Marketing, Marketing and Sales, Marketspace

a.aria-label: Marketing with Intent to Solve Problems, Not Just Sell a Product

h2.a: Marketing with Intent to Solve Problems, Not Just Sell a Product

div.p: In marketing and sales, if everything was a nail and Intent data was a hammer, life would be so much easier and we could all go golfing or whatever your golf equivalent is. Unfortunately, using intent data and behavioral signals requires just a bit more data science and work to make it all come together nicely.
